overview: My research focuses on the role of the immune system in the natural history of breast cancer and developing new immunotherapy strategies to improve outcomes in breast cancer.
research_interests:
Dr. Soliman's research focuses on the development of new immunotherapy treatments (vaccines, immune modulating drugs) in the treatment of breast cancer.
